attributes.action: Extend Universal Credit 6 months period and provide extra financial support
attributes.additional_details: With current situation and another national lockdown, those who lost their jobs due to Covid-19 and have been forced to join Universal Credit should get extra 3 months of UC support after 6 months period is finished, plus an extra financial support on top of their monthly payments to be able to cover necessary expenses. Current financial support from UC is insufficient and 6 months of this support is not enough due to current circumstances.
attributes.background: Universal Credit should be extended after 6 months period and provide extra financial support on top of monthly payment to cover necessary expenses for those who lost their jobs due to Covid-19.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Universal Credit is not normally time limited, but based on circumstances. We think this petition might be similar to what you want to see happen: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559422
